alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 9:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bergen, southern Westchester, Queens, Bronx, New York (Manhattan) and Nassau Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 904 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Union, or near Summit, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Yonkers, New Rochelle, Flushing, White Plains, Mott Haven, Levittown, East Tremont, Freeport, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Port Chester, Glen Cove, Garden City and Massapequa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester
